amendment.description: To certify that taxpayers' dollars and students' tuition support educational rather than lobbying activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2369 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2369 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S9752-9756; text: CR S9752) To certify that taxpayers' dollars and students' tuition support educational rather than lobbying activities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2369 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2369 proposed by Senator Coburn.
